name: picsur
description: Picsur is a self-hosted image hosting service that allows users to upload and manage pictures with expiration, album support, and direct links in a modern interface.
features: Image hosting: Upload and host images with direct links for embedding in websites and applications.
Album support: Organize images into albums for better management and sharing.
Expiration settings: Configure automatic deletion of images after a specified time period.
User accounts: Create accounts to manage personal image collections and upload history.
Image optimization: Automatically compress and optimize images to reduce file size and bandwidth.
Multiple formats: Support for JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP, and other common image formats.
Shareable links: Generate permanent or temporary links to share images publicly or privately.
API access: Upload and manage images programmatically using a RESTful API.
Thumbnail generation: Automatically create thumbnails for faster loading in galleries and previews.
Access controls: Set permissions to control who can view, upload, or manage images.
Storage management: Monitor storage usage and set quotas to prevent excessive disk consumption.
Embed codes: Generate HTML and Markdown embed codes for easy integration into content.
